title: What were the Rome tennis results?
description: Two of the Internazionali BNL d'Italia quarter-finals took place Thursday, when Jannik Sinner defeated Casper Ruud for the loss of just one game and Tommy Paul ousted Hubert Hurkacz to return to the Rome semi-finals. Rome

Sinner dominates Ruud, Paul ousts Hurkacz

May 15, 2025

Getty Images

The Internazionali BNL d'Italia is the fifth ATP Masters 1000 event of the season. By ATP Staff

Two of the Internazionali BNL d'Italia quarter-finals took place Thursday, when Jannik Sinner defeated Casper Ruud for the loss of just one game and Tommy Paul ousted Hubert Hurkacz to return to the Rome semi-finals.

View all the Rome tennis results from Thursday below.

Results - Thursday, 15 May 2025
Men's Singles - Quarterfinal
ATP - [11] Tommy Paul (USA) d [30] Hubert Hurkacz (POL) 76(4) 63
ATP - [1] Jannik Sinner (ITA) d [6] Casper Ruud (NOR) 60 61

Men's Doubles - Quarterfinal
ATP - Joe Salisbury (GBR)/Neal Skupski (GBR) d [4] Marcel Granollers (ESP)/Horacio Zeballos (ARG) 63 62
ATP - [1] Marcelo Arevalo (ESA)/Mate Pavic (CRO) d [7] Christian Harrison (USA)/Evan King (USA) 75 64

Women's Singles
WTA - [6] Jasmine Paolini (ITA) d Peyton Stearns (USA) 75 61

Women's Doubles
WTA - Storm Hunter (AUS)/Ellen Perez (AUS) d Ulrikke Eikeri (NOR)/Eri Hozumi (JPN) 46 62 10-5
WTA - Veronika Kudermetova/Elise Mertens (BEL) d \[8] Asia Muhammad (USA)/Demi Schuurs (NED) 36 62 10-4
